HEAD.title: Pennsylvania Spatial Data Access | Full Metadata

BODY.H2: WPC RF3 river reachs (includes percentage land-use)

DL.DT: Originator:David Homans, Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program
DL.DD: WPC RF3 river reachs (includes percentage land-use)
Land Use data was derived from the National Landcover Dataset while huc12 watersheds were derived from draft huc 12 watersheds being compiled by all states involved.

DIV.PRE: Drainage area polygons for each RF3 river reach flowing in Pennsylvania. Includes percentage land-use information from the National Land Cover Dataset for each river reach drainage area.
To assess land use along a river reach scale for use in the Pennsylvania Aquatic Community Classification project being preformed by the Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program.

By acceptance of this data, the user agrees to include a copy of this metadata record, including the liability disclaimer, whenever the user transmits or provides the GIS Data(or any portion of it) to another user.

DL.DT: Contact_Organization:Pennsylvania Natural Heritage Program (Western Pennsylvania Conservancy)

DL.DD: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.2 (Build 3790) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000
Drainage area polygons for each RF3 river reach that flows in Pennsylvania. Base polygons developed by Arlene Oliviera and Tom Fitzhugh.
National Land Cover Dataset was used for defining the land use percentages for each HUC 12

DIV.PRE: the number of NLDC cells of each cell type RF3 reach drainage area were tabulated for all RF3 watersheds (Tabulate areas option) and then exported as a DBF file.

Total Number of cells for each RF3 reach drainage area were calcuated and then used to determine percent of land use class for each RF3 reach drainage area. At this time field names were changed to more clearly denote what land type each cell class represents ( see http://landcover.usgs.gov/classes.asp ). Summary land use types (total forest, total agriculture, total developed, total wetland) were also added. This was then exported as a seperate DBF.
The new land cover percentance table was then attached to the original RF3 reach drainage area polygon layer which was then saved as a new shape file.
Shape file was reprojected from PA Albers projection into NAD 27 Decimal Degrees.

DL.DD: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

DIV.PRE: Unique ID for each rf3 watershed polygon. In the form HUC 8 number (sans leading 0); stream number; segment rivermile

DL.DD: Unique ID for each rf3 watershed polygon.

DIV.PRE: % class 21 (Low Intensity Residential) for the watershed.
% class 22 (High Intensity Residential) for the watershed.

DL.DD: % class 22 (High Intensity Residential) for the watershed.

DIV.PRE: % class 32 (Quarries/Strip Mines/Gravel Pits) for the watershed.

DL.DD: % class 32 (Quarries/Strip Mines/Gravel Pits) for the watershed.

DIV.PRE: % class 32 (Quarries/Strip Mines/Gravel Pits) for the watershed.

DL.DD: % class 32 (Quarries/Strip Mines/Gravel Pits) for the watershed.

DIV.PRE: % class 92 (Emergent Herbaceous Wetlands) for the watershed.

DL.DD: % class 92 (Emergent Herbaceous Wetlands) for the watershed.

DIV.PRE: Total # of NLCD cells in poygon.

DL.DD: Total # of NLCD cells in poygon.

DIV.PRE: % total wetland for the watershed (class 91 and 92).

DL.DD: % total wetland for the watershed (class 91 and 92).

DIV.PRE: % total agricultural land use for the watershed (class 81,82, and 85).

DL.DD: % total agricultural land use for the watershed (class 81,82, and 85).

DIV.PRE: Includes percentage land-use information from the National Land Cover Dataset for each river reach drainage area.
